detail_desc: Hair clip in the shape of a metal ring that opens and has a hair elastic inside.
Bohemian top in a crinkled weave with elastication at the top and hem, decorative buttons at the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.

Lightly padded parka in cotton twill with a high collar and lined hood with a folding trim around the edge. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, handwarmer pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud, and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Drawstring at the waist and a tab with a press-stud at the cuffs. Quilted lining.
Slides with thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, front and back pockets, and narrow hems.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and short trumpet sleeves. Wrapover front with a concealed press-stud and a smocked hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit wool and cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short T-shirt in soft jersey with a trim in a contrasting colour at the neckline and sleeves.

Sleeveless dress in tulle with floral appliqués. Concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt that is lined with two layers of tulle for added width. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend. Elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Classic T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and print motif on the front.
Non-wired triangle bra in microfibre and lace with moulded cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Wide fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.

Long-sleeved top and a pair of trousers in soft fabric. Top in sweatshirt fabric with a text motif on the front, press-studs on one shoulder, raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Padded, gently fitted gilet in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets with a press-stud, and smocking at the sides. Lined.

Top in sturdy, cotton sweatshirt fabric. Relaxed fit with a folded detail at the shoulders to create a defined silhouette and long sleeves with shaping seams. Wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
V-neck blouse in an airy weave with a pleated yoke front and back, long sleeves with an opening and ties at the cuffs, and a straight-cut hem.
Leggings in jersey made from a soft, organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist. One patterned pair and one pair in a solid colour.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Push-up bras in cotton jersey with lace details and underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline, long sleeves and an elastic hem with a text print.
Short-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Thin metal chain anklets, one decorated with glass beads. Adjustable length 21.5-25 cm.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Fine-knit polo shirt in a silk and cotton blend with a button placket and ribbing at the collar, cuffs and hem.

Body in jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck with a decorative pompom trim. Seam at the front of the waist with a crocheted lace trim, and concealed press-studs at the crotch. Unlined.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim made from a cotton blend with a regular, adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Short, wide top in a textured cotton weave with a small frill at the top and narrow, tie-top shoulder straps.
Dress in a softly draping viscose crêpe weave with a slightly wider neckline and short sleeves. Detachable tie belt at the waist and a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with a shawl collar, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with an integral sports bra and racer back. Sports bra with a double layer of fabric at the front, elasticated hem and opening at the back with crossover straps.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Maxi dress in woven fabric with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps. Elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut, softly draping skirt with high slits in the sides.
Calf-length skirt in airy, crinkled voile made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend. High, elasticated waist with a small frill trim. Lined in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Padded rainbow fancy dress costume with a glitter print motif on the front and jersey yoke. Polyester filling.
Fitted jacket in fleece jersey designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. Hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and thumbholes at the cuffs. Unlined.
Jeans in washed stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Shorts in stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge, asymmetric hems with embroidered lace.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with a round neck and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jacket in washed denim with worn details, a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, and buttoned cuffs.
Necklace with three thin metal chains in various designs, two with a coin-shaped pendant. Adjustable length.
Cardigan in a soft knit with a shawl collar, dropped shoulders and no buttons.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs. Push up shaping – denim with a superstretch function that showcases the body’s physique.
Swimming trunks with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Sports vest top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and a shorter top in airy fabric layered over the top.
Straight.cut jacket in soft faux fur with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and side pockets. Lined.

Sleeveless playsuit in an airy, textured weave with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck, buttons down the front and a concealed zip in one side. Cut-out section at the back with a twisted detail at the top and elastication at the back of the waist. Jersey-lined bottom section.
Long jacket in jersey with narrow notch lapels and patch front pockets. Unlined.
Joggers in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a fake back pocket. Tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Shorts in an airy viscose weave. High waist with wide, covered elastication at the back, pleats at the top, diagonal side pockets and wide legs.

Top in cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front, (size 2-3Y with normal sequins). Long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs, slits in the sides and a raw-edge hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Calf-length skirt in a softly draping weave with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Unlined.

Calf-length wrap dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a press-stud at the neckline and short puff sleeves. Double layer at the front with a practical inner top for easier nursing access, and a seam at the waist with a tie belt and concealed press-stud. Lined.
Boots in imitation leather with lacing at the front, rounded toes and chunky soles at the front. Recycled polyester linings and insoles. Heel 10.5 cm.
T-shirt in printed jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Long-sleeved dress with a fine-knit top and woven, flared, lined skirt.

Down jacket in nylon with a light sheen and lined hood with an elasticated drawstring. Zip down the front, side pockets and an elasticated drawstring at the rounded hem. Lined. Filling 90% down, 10% feathers.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist and lined gusset.

Platform sandals in imitation suede with imitation cork wedge heels, an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle and open toes. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform 2.5 cm, heel approx. 10cm.
Straight-cut dress in a soft weave with a V-neck and small stand-up collar. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Slip-on trainers with fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Fancy dress gloves in jersey with a glow-in-the-dark print.
Jumper in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend containing some wool with a round neck and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, closely-knit cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Fully lined triangle bikini top with removable inserts, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a metal fastener at the front and covered elastication at the back.
Cropped, fitted top in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in a soft slub cotton jersey and viscose blend with a deep V-neck at the front and seam centre back.
Sleeveless blouse in a crêpe weave with a stand-up collar, ties at the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem.
Mittens in a soft knit with fold-down ribbing at the cuffs. Fleece lining. Sizes 0-6M without thumbs.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend.
